item.title: Visions of Mana Release Date and Time
item.description:
Quick Links

  • What Time Does Visions of Mana Come Out?
  • What's in the Digital Deluxe Edition of Visions of Mana?

It's been almost 20 years since a mainline Mana game has hit store shelves, so it's safe to say that many fans are pretty pumped to check out Visions of Mana once it launches on August 29, 2024. However, it's worth noting that fans can start playing the action RPG a little bit earlier than the majority. We have all the details for the release time for Visions of Mana on PlayStation, Xbox, and PC (Steam), so keep reading to find out more.

What Time Does Visions of Mana Come Out?

Visions of Mana Release Time on PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox Series X/S

Square Enix has not published a release time infographic for Visions of Mana (if they do, we'll update this post), but for now, we have a clear idea of when it'll come out.

The $59.99 standard edition of Visions of Mana should be released on August 29, 2024, at midnight Eastern time (12 AM) . This release timing is for the Xbox and PlayStation versions. However, it seems that the Steam (PC) version of Visions of Mana will probably launch around noon ET on August 29, 2024, a couple of hours after its console counterparts

But, as we mentioned before, there is a way to play Visions of Mana an entire day early , but the only way is to pay $20 more for the Digital Deluxe edition.

What's in the Digital Deluxe Edition of Visions of Mana?

The big draw for the Deluxe package of Visions of Mana is the ability to access it 24 hours before its official launch. That means, if you're on a console, you can play Visions of Mana on August 28 at midnight Eastern time . As for Steam, it should be available around noon ET on August 28, 2024.

The special edition also comes with the Mana Superstars Costume Set , featuring special outfits for Val, Julei, Careena, Morley, and Palamena. It also comes with 26 special tracks, dubbed the 'Mana Series BGM Bundle .'

Down below, we'll include a table of the various release times for different regions so you can be ready to play as soon as Visions of Mana goes live digitally. Of course, if you're buying the game physically, you don't need to worry about digital release times:

Visions of Mana Release Time (Standard)

Visions of Mana Release Time (Digital Deluxe)

August 28 - 9 PM PT (Los Angeles) - Console

August 29 - 9 AM PT (Los Angeles) - PC via Steam

August 27 - 9 PM PT (Los Angeles) - Console

August 28 - 9 AM PT (Los Angeles) - PC via Steam

August 29 - 12 AM ET (NYC) - Console

August 29 - 12 PM ET (NYC) - PC via Steam

August 28 - 12 AM ET (NYC) - Console

August 28 - 12 PM ET (NYC) - PC via Steam

August 29 - 5 AM BST (London) - Console

August 29 - 5 PM BST (London) - PC via Steam

August 28 - 5 AM BST (London) - Console

August 28 - 5 PM BST (London) - PC via Steam

August 29 - 6 AM CEST (Berlin) - Console

August 29 - 6 PM CEST (Berlin) - PC via Steam

August 28 - 6 AM CEST (Berlin) - Console

August 28 - 6 PM CEST (Berlin) - PC via Steam

August 29 - 1 PM JST (Tokyo) - Console

August 30 - 1 AM JST (Tokyo) - PC via Steam

August 28 - 1 PM JST (Tokyo) - Console

August 29 - 1 AM JST (Tokyo) - PC via Steam

item.title: How to Get Manhwa in Anime Card Battle
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get Manhwa Pack in Anime Card Battle
  • All Manhwa Pack Cards

The main gameplay of Anime Card Battle is the constant roll of Cards with different rarities. The higher the rarity of the Card, the more difficult it is to get. However, some copies require special conditions to be met. Therefore, in this guide, we will tell you how to get the Manhwa Pack in Anime Card Battle .

This Pack gives players a chance to get exclusive Cards in this Roblox experience. However, be prepared for the fact that you will have to roll a lot first. And we mean much more than a few thousand.

How to Get Manhwa Pack in Anime Card Battle

When you first start your adventure in Anime Card Battle , you will immediately receive the Normal Pull Pack. With its help, you can get most of the Cards. However, there is also a second Pack in the game, which allows the player to roll Cards from popular Manhwa titles. So, to get the Manhwa Pack in Anime Card Battle , you need to roll at least 100,000 times .

And in reality, it is as difficult as it sounds. Even with Fast Rolls activated, you will still need a large amount of time to reach the goal. Therefore, if you are a new player, then you should just progress and defeat bosses. This way, you will be able to get Potions and charms that will help speed up the progression.

When you finally reach the 100,000 roll mark, you need to visit the Card Packs NPC. It is located near the Potion Shop. After that, you only need to interact with it to get the coveted Manhwa Pack in Anime Card Battle .

All Manhwa Pack Cards

As we said, Manhwa Pack in Anime Card Battle contains Cards with characters from popular Manhwa, such as Solo Leveling , Tower of God , etc. So, if you are a fan of these titles, then you should add these Cards to your collection. Below, you will find a list of all the unique Cards that can only be obtained from the Manhwa Pack.

Manhwa Card Rarity Ability
Tenacious Hunter 1/10,000,000 Heal to full HP after defeating an opponent.
The Lone Reader 1/5,000,000 On entry copy the ability of a random card in your deck.
Monkey King 1/1,000,000 Attack the entire enemy deck dealing 10% of his damage
Scarlet Noble 1/500,000 Stuns the enemy card on entry for two turns.
Crimson Knight 1/250,000 Ignores defensive abilities. If an ability is ignored gain 20% attack.
Hardcore Gamer 1/150,000 Every turn flip a coin for a 50% damage buff. If heads, give a buff to your card, Tails - to an enemy.
Silver Enigma 1/100,000 If a card enters after another card attack on entry dealing 3x damage.
The Irregular 1/25,000 Plant an energy bomb that detonates after 1 turn dealing 2x damage.
Sword Saintess 1/1,000 Heal 20% at the start of your turn.

item.title: 6 Best Open-World RPG DLCs, Ranked
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Open-world RPGs offer players vast maps, quests, and secrets for hundreds of hours of gameplay.
  • DLCs for these games can expand stories, add darker themes, and provide more challenges and new maps.
  • Games like Cyberpunk 2077, Fallout 4, and The Witcher 3 have standout DLCs that enhance the player experience.

Some of the biggest games released over the last few decades have been open-world RPGs. These addictive games drop players into huge worlds with no set path and allow them to find their own unique way. With vast maps to explore, quests to complete, and secrets to uncover, these large-scale games offer hundreds of hours of gameplay.

Over the years, these games have grown to incredible sizes and presented lands with rich histories and cultures. However, as with many modern games, the story doesn't always end with the base game. DLCs allow developers to expand and sometimes improve on their games. They often move into darker themes and can offer a higher level of challenge. Many DLCs even add large new maps to their games, providing players with many more hours of content.

6 Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty

A Second Chance For The Troubled Game

Plagued with technical issues from the beginning, the sprawling open-world sci-fi RPG, Cyberpunk 2077 , had one of the worst video game releases in history. Since then, the game has come a long way, fixing its myriad of optimization issues and finally finding a larger audience. Much of this turnaround was in part thanks to its excellent expansion, Phantom Liberty .

The DLC acted as a relaunch of the game, showcasing the many improvements that had been added, and it also featured Hollywood star Idris Elba. The game introduced a new district to the map, called Dogtown, a new skill tree, and new weapons and vehicles. The expansion follows the main character V, a mercenary for hire, on a mission to save the President of the United States, who has crash-landed in Dogtown.

5 Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion - The Shivering Isles

A Journey Into Madness

Before the titanic successes of Skyrim and Fallout 3 made Bethesda the AAA developer it is today, Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion sat as their greatest achievement. Oblivion is a large open-world fantasy RPG that is beloved by its loyal fanbase. While it has its rough edges, like many Bethesda games, Oblivion presents a stunning fantasy world, with several towns and cities scattered throughout the map.

While Oblivion is set within a magical realm, its brilliant DLC, The Shivering Isles, would take the game on stranger paths. Here, players are transported to the realm of Sheogorath, the Daedric Prince of Madness, where they get to explore a vibrant world filled with strange giant plants, colorful skies, and dangerous enemies. The game is set around the Greymarch, where the Forces of Order fight against Chaos. The Shivering Isles is a fun adventure that sits perfectly against the grand story told in the base game and is one of the best Bethesda has produced.

4 Fallout 4: Far Harbor

Discover What Hides In The Mist

Fallout 4 is a huge open-world experience, filled with secret locations, warring factions, and mutated beasts. It takes players into the decimated nuclear remains of Boston, where the lone survivor of Vault 111, frozen for 210 years, awakens to search for their missing child, Shaun, in a strange, unfamiliar world. The game would introduce several DLCs, with most expanding on the base game’s core mechanics. However, its best overall expansion takes players to a whole new area.

Taking inspiration from classic H.P. Lovecraft novellas, such as The Shadow over Innsmouth , Fallout 4 ’s excellent DLC, Far Harbor , is a welcome change from the base game. Fallout 4 enjoys several high-quality DLCs that provide excellent new content to the game. However, Far Harbor stands out for its bleaker tone, strange new enemies, and a narrative that sits perfectly with the main quest of Fallout 4 . The game follows the player’s investigation into a missing girl, who has been taken in by a group of Synths, on the run from the Institute. Far Harbor is filled with new locations to explore, new quests to complete, and tough new challenges to take on.

3 Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim - Dragonborn

Battle The First Dragonborn

While their games are often imperfect, few developers have had as big an impact as Bethesda. For many, their crowning achievement is Skyrim . The fifth entry in the Elder Scrolls series takes players to a vast snowy landscape, filled with ancient ruins, mysterious caves, and mythical enemies. It introduced new magic and new mechanics to the series and was an instant classic.

Skyrim ’s fantastic DLC, Dragonborn , expanded on the lore and land of the game, taking players to the island of Solstheim, previously seen in Morrowind . In the expansion, players battle with the original Dragonborn, Miraak, and deal with Hermaeus Mora, the Daedric Prince of knowledge. Skyrim ’s DLC moves quickly into cosmic horror territory, something often seen in Bethesda’s expansions. Dragonborn is the perfect addition to Skyrim . It provides hours of engaging content that is a welcome change from the base game but still feels like a part of the established world.

2 The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine

A Vibrant Sun-Drenched Adventure

The Witcher 3 is considered one of the best games ever made. It set a new standard for open-world RPGs with its living, breathing world. While the game’s first DLC offered a new storyline set within the established region, the second would take players to a whole new area. Blood and Wine is the final DLC of The Witcher 3 , and it feels like a grand send-off.

Entering Toussaint, players find a sun-drenched land of noble knights, rolling vineyards, and ravenous vampires. Where the base game presents a grim, medieval feeling, with dark forests, dangerous swamps, and ravaged battlefields, Blood and Wine offers a welcome change. The game follows Geralt’s investigation into a string of murders that becomes a desperate battle with an ancient vampire. Blood and Wine is filled with dangerous enemies, new contracts, powerful weapons, and fun new characters, and it is the perfect end to a fantastic game.

1 Elden Ring: Shadow Of The Erdtree

Take On Greater Challenges In The Land Of Shadow

Expanding on both the difficulty and lore, Shadow of the Erdtree is the phenomenal new DLC to the modern action-rpg classic, Elden Ring . The DLC presents a huge new area that will test even veteran players’ resolve. On the trail of Miquella, the Tarnished ventures to the Land of Shadow to follow in the demigod’s footsteps, where tough new battles await. The game introduces many new characters, as well as new weapons, armor, and spells.

Shadow of the Erdtree raises the difficulty of Elden Ring , offering highly aggressive boss fights that require patience and perseverance. The DLC is huge, with hours of content to find. As with all FromSoftware games, their exceptional level design is on full display, with sprawling castles, dark corrupted forests, and ancient ruins littering the land. Shadow of the Erdtree is a worthy expansion to one of the highest-rated games in history and continues FromSoftware’s domination of the genre.

item.title: 8 Open-World Games You Can Only Play On Mobile
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Mobile gaming offers a variety of open-world experiences, exclusive titles, and profitable opportunities for developers and players alike.
  • Games like Gangstar Series and The Legend of Neverland provide immersive gameplay and unique features tailored for mobile platforms.
  • The mobile gaming market continues to grow with content-rich MMORPGs like Stormfall and Evil Lands, offering diverse gameplay experiences.

When open-world games become the topic of conversation, games like Red Dead Redemption 2 , Skyrim , and Minecraft come to mind, and for good reason. Players who enjoy games with expansive worlds want an immersive experience that consoles and PCs have the storage space for.

However, while a majority of open-world games can usually be found on consoles or PC, there are plenty of captivating worlds to explore on mobile. The mobile gaming market is one of the most underrated areas of the games industry. There are thousands of different games available for any type of gamer, from casual to competitive. There are also plenty of open-world games on mobile that, are not available on other platforms.

Updated August 23, 2024, by Mehrdad Khayyat: Mobile gaming might not get as much attention from the media as PC and console gaming, but it is indeed one of the most growing and highly profitable areas for developers and publishers. The on-the-go nature of mobile gaming makes it quite an accessible option for anyone around the globe.

Mobile gaming is now big enough that it has its own exclusive titles. Games like Clash Royale are more popular than many triple-A games on PC or consoles while remaining exclusive to their original platform. This tradition has now grown into open-world games with some brilliant experiences available for mobile gamers.

Gangstar Series

GTA-Like Open-World Experience With Mansion-Building System

  • Platforms: Android and iOS
  • Release: 2017 (New Orleans)
  • Genre: Third-Person, Action Open-World
  • Developer: Gameloft

Before the Grand Theft Auto series came to mobile with the remastered trilogy, the Gangstar franchise was the closest experience in the same genre for mobile gamers. Each installment in the series takes place in one of the cities in the United States, but none of them became as popular as Gangstar: Vegas and Gangstar: New Orleans .

The latest entry in the series elevated the gameplay experience in the franchise by allowing players to buy their own private property and upgrade it over time, which turns into a luxury mansion in the end. Gangstar: New Orleans offers lots of action-packed missions in an online environment.

X Survive

Large-Scale Survivor Game With Detailed Base-Building

  • Platforms: Android and iOS
  • Release: 2018
  • Genre: Third-Person, Survival
  • Developer: Free Square Games

X Survive is an open-world survival game that is pretty large in scope, making it quite impressive that this game works on mobile platforms. The game is a laid-back and relaxing experience, despite players having to manage their hunger, thirst, and fatigue, as is to be expected with most survival games.

Players can scavenge for resources, craft items, and build everything from small houses to decently sized settlements. The game may not be the most polished title, but the sheer ambition present in this mobile open-world game is so impressive that most people will be floored at its sheer scope.

Six-Guns: Gang Showdown

Explore The Wild West In A Story-Driven Adventure

  • Platforms: Android and iOS
  • Release: 2011
  • Genre: Third-Person, Action Open-World
  • Developer: Gameloft

Six-Guns: Gang Showdown is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Gameloft, a developer infamous for making mobile games with varying levels of quality. This company usually apes the formal of successful big-budget titles, so it's no surprise that Six-Guns: Gang Showdown is clearly trying to emulate one of the greatest open-world games of all time, Red Dead Redemption 2 .

Set in the Wild West, the game follows the story of a cowboy named Buck Crosshaw, who must fight his way through both regular and supernatural enemies, adding a ton of variety to the game's shootouts. Players can explore a vast world, complete missions, and unlock new weapons, gear, horses, and everything else along the same lines as they progress through the game.

The Legend Of Neverland

Anime-Style Adventure Inspired By Genshin Impact

  • Platforms: Android and iOS
  • Release: 2022
  • Genre: MMORPG
  • Developer: Ark Games Global

JRPG fans will want to check out The Legend of Neverlan d . The game features a large world full of unique characters and adventure. The Legend of Neverland features four classes players can switch between. Each of the classes has its own skill tree that allows for more customization between each class.

Players are also able to dye clothing in the game, to create their own unique look. There are also plenty of ways to wind down, from fishing to cooking and even mining. The Legend of Neverland is available on IOS and Android.

Stormfall: Saga of Survival

Build, Craft, And Defend The Home

  • Platforms: Android and iOS
  • Release: 2018
  • Genre: Survival, MMORPG
  • Developer: Plarium Global Ltd.

In Stormfall: Saga of Survival players will have to survive a wasteland known as the Eastern Marches. The survival MMORPG will require players to hunt for food and seek out water and resources. Players will craft what they need to improve their campsite.

The game also features ways to learn powerful magic through runes to defend against enemies and enhance tools and equipment. Stormfall: Saga of Survival is currently available on Android and IOS.

Flight

Experience Flying In Nature From The Perspective Of A Raven

  • Platforms: Android and iOS
  • Release: 2020
  • Genre: Exploration, Relaxing
  • Developer: Ashim Shakya

In the mobile game Flight , players will take on the role of a monk who turns into a raven to venture across the world. Players will fly through the valleys and mountains of Nepal. There are no enemies or dangers that threaten the player, leaving them free to hover in the wild.

While the primary gameplay mechanic is exploring the open world through flight, players are able to transform back into a monk to explore the jungle floor and underground. Flight is available on Android and IOS.

Forsaken World: Gods and Demons

Content-Rich MMORPG With Unique Heroes

  • Platforms: Android and iOS
  • Release: 2020
  • Genre: Fantasy MMORPG
  • Developer: Perfect World Games

Fans of fantasy RPGs will want to take a look at Forsaken World: Gods and Demons on mobile. The game features a vibrant world full of amazing landscapes and plenty of secrets.

Players can create and join guilds and build guild fortresses to strategize with their friends. Forsaken World lets players take control and change their class at any point and also allows players to specialize in the skills that they want. The game's dynamic gameplay allows players to go on a new adventure every time they log in from dungeon crawling to dragon slaying. Forsaken World: Gods and Demons is available on Android and IOS.

Evil Lands

Slay Monsters And Beat Opponent Players In An Online Open-World Experience

  • Platforms: Android and iOS
  • Release: 2019
  • Genre: Online Action RPG
  • Developer: Rage Quit Games

In Evil Lands , players will battle monsters and dragons and become heroes of the land. The fantasy RPG features real-time multiplayer gameplay and a variety of maps to explore and quests to complete.

Players can choose between several classes, upgrades, skills, and items. Evil Lands also features cooperative and PvP modes. Cooperative mode allows players to team up for raids and epic battles. While PvP mode players can team up or battle against each other to see who is the strongest in the land. Evil Lands is available on Android and IOS.

item.title: How To Use Vengeful Mirage In Black Myth: Wukong
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Use Vengeful Mirage In Black Myth: Wukong
  • How Good Is Vengeful Mirage

Black Myth: Wukong puts a heavy focus on dodging, as there is a parry but it is tied to a specific spell. While most dodges will be a basic dodge to get out of the way, players can land a perfect dodge that will set you up greatly for a counterattack.

There are many additional upgrades players can unlock to make their perfect dodges more effective, with one of them being the Vengeful Mirage upgrade. While it may take players some time to unlock this upgrade, it is well worth the effort for those who have mastered the perfect dodge.

How To Use Vengeful Mirage In Black Myth: Wukong

  • Final upgrade in the Stamina skill tree.
  • It costs 2 Sparks to unlock.
  • Triggers only on perfect dodges.

Vengeful Spirit leaves behind an illusion after you land a perfect dodge that will explode after a second . The mirage will be placed wherever you first start to dodge animation and will explode after about a second without any trigger necessary from the player. While the in-game description for this ability calls it an explosion, it may not be as big and spectacular as you'd think.

The explosion will detonate from the mirage, but visually it amounts to little more than a few sparks shooting out in every direction from the mirage, and sometimes won't be noticeable to the player depending on the distance and background. While it may not look amazing visually, Vengeful Mirage can deal a decent bit of dodge for a dodge upgrade, and there is no limit to how many enemies it can hit.

The only trick to using this skill efficiently is that you'll need to land a perfect dodge to make the mirage , and that requires a dodge at the last second before an attack hits you. You'll know you landed a perfect dodge as time will slow down for a brief moment, much like landing Evanescence. Landing a perfect dodge every time will take practice, and is easiest against large enemies with slow attack animations, and players should practice perfect dodging whenever possible.

How Good Is Vengeful Mirage

Vengeful Mirage is a great skill players should unlock right away, as it can be unlocked and forgotten. Overall, players should always aim to get perfect dodges, and this upgrade only adds a bonus for when they do land. While the damage may not be a ton against a boss, landing multiple perfect dodges throughout a fight will slowly add up, and require no additional effort outside their usual play style .
